text: Te, kotoryye tratyat svoye imushchestvo, radi obreteniya blagovoleniya Allakha i radi togo, chtoby ukrepit' svoi dushi [v vere], podobny sadu na kholme: yesli yego orosit liven', on prinosit plody vdvoyne. Yesli zhe yego ne orosit liven', to okropit khotya by morosyashchiy dozhd'. Allakh vidit to, chto vy vershite
